details:
[23-Apr-2025 13:55:43 UTC] WordPress database error

CREATE TABLE wp_bt_ipay_payments ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `order_id` BIGINT NOT NULL , `ipay_id` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `amount` DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, `status` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `loy_id` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `loy_amount` DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, `loy_status` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `data` TEXT DEFAULT NULL , `created_at` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY `id` (`id`), INDEX `order_id` (`order_id`), INDEX `loy_id` (`loy_id`), UNIQUE KEY `ipay_id` (`ipay_id`) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
